conditions: ADHD (diagnosed age 9), Moderate acne, Seasonal allergies
medications: Adderall XR 20mg once daily in the morning for ADHD, Zyrtec 10mg daily for allergies, Benzoyl peroxide wash for acne (topical)
goals: Wants to get acne under control before senior year photos. Needs ADHD medication refill and check-in since dose was recently increased.
concerns: Acne has gotten worse in the past six months and over-the-counter treatments aren't helping. Sometimes has trouble sleeping since ADHD medication dose went up. Worried about acne scarring.
personality: Shy, monosyllabic, and typical teenager - gives short answers unless prompted. Slightly embarrassed to discuss acne. More engaged when asked about specific interests. Accompanied by parent who may try to answer for him.
